package.name: File_IMC
package.summary: Create and parse Internet Mail Consortium-style files (like vCard and vCalendar)
package.description:
Allows you to programmatically create a vCard or vCalendar, and fetch the text.
IMPORTANT: The array structure has changed slightly from Contact_Vcard_Parse. See the example output for the new structure. Also different from Contact_Vcard is the use of a factory pattern. Again, see the examples.
package.notes: * #15608: fixed file loading (again) * fixed class-/file-naming (a slight BC break) * raised dependency to PHP5 * changed license from PHP to BSD

release.notes: * Added file_exists() check to prevent E_NOTICE errors in factory if file doesn't exist (thanks, Davey) * Cleaned up error handling to let the user app have control (File_IMC_Build::raiseError() no longer passes a PEAR_ERROR_* to PEAR::raiseError()) (thanks, Greg) * Minor documentation additions/modifications (thanks, Greg)

* Added preliminary vCalendar parsing support. Has yet to be tested with complex input files. * Added vCard build support from Contact_Vcard_Build. * File_IMC_Parse can now handle nested BEGIN/END blocks (to support vCal). * Included example scripts and sample vCard and vCalendar files.
